description:
We’ve built up our reputation over 20 years, having worked on some of the most exciting projects in county and beyond. We’re a small, close-knit team, which we believe gives us our edge. We work closely together and spark off each other’s creative ideas and visions to come up with the most talked about campaigns. With a perfect mix of experienced individuals and fresh young talent, no project is beyond our capability.
We’ve worked with clients who span across a range of sectors including corporate and commercial, charity, the arts, manufacturing, tourism and public and professional services. Creating work for a diverse range of clients showcases our ability to be responsive to your needs and channel our creative talent into a variety of projects. Whether you’re after expertise in design, digital, branding, marketing, PR, events, exhibitions, advertising or social media support, you’re on to a winner when you choose Team PB.
